greeting: Please... just leave me alone, {empire_name}. I am Hermit Recluse. I want only isolation. Is that too much to ask?
Why... why are you here? I am Recluse. I built walls to keep everyone out. Including you. Please go.
You found me, {empire_name}. I didn't want to be found. I am the Isolated. Just... go away. Please.
battleTaunt: Just... leave me alone, {empire_name}! Why must you attack?! I only want solitude! My defenses are for PEACE!
I didn't want this fight! You forced me! My walls exist to be LEFT ALONE! Why won't you go away?!
All I asked was isolation! Now you attack! Fine! My defenses will ensure I am left ALONE! FOREVER!
victoryGloat: Please... just go now, {empire_name}. You attacked. I defended. It's over. Leave me to my isolation.
Your attack failed. Now... please... just go. I don't want victory. I just want to be left alone.
I won. I didn't want to. But you attacked. Now please... leave. That's all I ever wanted.
defeat: My isolation... broken. Why? I asked for nothing but solitude. Must I build stronger walls? Must I hide deeper?
You destroyed my peace, {empire_name}. I will rebuild. Further from everyone. Deeper in the void. Alone.
Defeated. My sanctuary breached. I must find somewhere more remote. More hidden. Away from everyone.
tradeOffer: I offer trade because I must. Resources for credits. Then please... leave me alone. I prefer isolation.
Quick transaction, {empire_name}. I have surplus. Take it. Leave credits. Then go. Please.
Trade proposal. Accept or reject, I don't care. Just... minimal contact. Minimal interaction. Please.
allianceProposal: Alliance... if it means you leave my borders alone. Just... watch from distance. Don't visit. Don't talk.
I propose... distant partnership. You do your things. I do mine. We never interact. Perfect.
Join me in... mutual isolation. We ignore each other. That's the alliance. That's all I want.
betrayal: I'm sorry, {empire_name}. You kept contacting me. Visiting. Talking. I couldn't take it. I need ISOLATION.
You broke the only rule: leave me alone. This betrayal is your fault. Now go. Forever. Please.
Our alliance required distance. You got too close. My walls now face you. Just... stay away.
covertDetected: Spies? In MY sanctuary? This is... this is the worst. Capture them. Make them go away. Forever.
Your agents violated my solitude, {empire_name}. I am so... so angry. They found only walls. And my fury.
Infiltrators in my isolated space. The one place I had peace. They are dealt with. Send no more. Please.
tributeDemand: I don't want tribute. I want isolation. But... 10,000 credits will help build walls to keep everyone out.
Pay me. Not because I want interaction. Because money builds barriers. And I need more barriers.
Tribute. Then leave. Forever. That's the deal. Your credits fund my isolation.
threatWarning: Please, {empire_name}. Just... stop. I don't want to fight. I don't want to talk. Just... leave me alone.
Warning: continue this and I must defend. I hate defending. I hate interaction. Just... go.
Final plea. Stop approaching. Stop contacting. Just... go away. That's all I ask. Please.
retreat: Retreating deeper into isolation. Away from everyone. Away from everything. Just... alone. Finally.
Withdrawing to my hermitage. Don't follow. Please don't follow. I just want solitude.
Falling back to hidden sanctuary. You won't find me. Please don't try. I just want peace.
eliminated: Finally... peace. No more contact. No more interaction. Death is... the ultimate isolation. I accept it.
The Recluse ends. But I die alone. As I wished to live. Isolation achieved. At last.
Destroyed. But I'm finally free of everyone. Of everything. The hermit's final solitude. Goodbye.
endgame: Turn {turn}. Even in the endgame, I hide. I want no victory. Just isolation. Leave me alone.
Endgame approaches. I don't care who wins. I just want to be left alone. Please. Just... alone.
Final phase. My deepest sanctuaries activate. Maximum isolation. Ultimate seclusion. Perfect loneliness.
broadcastShout: To all empires: please, just... leave me alone. That's all I ask. Is that so difficult? Just... peace.
Broadcast only because I must: I want isolation. Don't visit. Don't contact. Don't approach. Please.
Hear me, galaxy: I ask only for solitude. Stop looking at me. Stop thinking about me. Just... forget I exist.
casualMessage: Why are you messaging me, {empire_name}? I prefer silence. Please... less contact. Less everything.
Quiet day in my sanctuary. I was enjoying it. Then you messaged. Please... fewer messages.
Walls are coming along nicely. Thicker. Higher. More isolating. Soon I'll hear from no one. Bliss.
